      • getTranslogGenerationOfLastCommit

        public long getTranslogGenerationOfLastCommit​()
        Returns a translog generation that will be used to calculate the number of uncommitted operations since the last index commit. See Translog.uncommittedOperations() and Translog.uncommittedSizeInBytes()
